2.「来るな！ 私に近づくなぁっ！: Get away from me! Get away from me!

3.「シェリル……。| 本当のこと 教えてくれて ありがとう。| 助けにきたわ。さあ: Cheryl... Thank you for telling me the truth.|I'm here to help... Come here, come here...

21.「ふたりなら きっと 大丈夫…だよ……。: We're gonna be okay. We'll be fine.

23.「……息がある。| よかった。気を失っているだけか……。: ... Breathe. I'm... I think I'm just|fainting.

26.「この呪いはな……。| 賢者の持つ 心の闇に棲みつき| その闇を増幅させ 心を: This curse... It dwells in the darkness of|the wise man's mind, amplifying that darkness|and corrupting his soul.

27.「そして それに 耐えられなくなったとき| 呪われた者は 悪しき賢者……| 闇賢: And when they can no longer bear it, the|damned will fall to the wicked wise... The|Dark Sage.

If we leave her like this, Arnea's mind will|be corrupted by the curse and she'll fall|into the hands of the Dark Sage. I have to|
|stop that from happening at all costs.
